issue.title: [Python] Docstring for parquet.read_table is misleading or incorrect
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2198](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2198). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/python/pyarrow/parquet.py#L872

One should be able to pass a Python file object directly. The docstring suggests otherwise

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2198?focusedCommentId=16381495) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1654
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1654>
